attributes.action: mandate the all Schools make sure that liquid anti-bacterial soap is available at all times in toilet facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year million's of people suffer Winter Vomiting Virus, Colds, Flus and other viruses.  Most websites attribute Schools as being in the top 2 of places where these spread.  Better handwashing facilities in every school would help to make sure we reduce the spread of these awful viruses.
